items.name: flowise@3.0.11
items.summary:
⚠️ Breaking Change ⚠️

The Read/Write Tools functionality has been permanently removed.

Alternative: Google and Microsoft tools

  • Cho

What's Changed

Features

  • Fetch and store more data about Okta authorization server
